message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This paper uses multiple datasets including Global Findex and LSMS covering 11 African countries to examine the impact of financial inclusion on poverty reduction.", "dataset": ["Global Findex", "LSMS"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "Using the Food Balance Sheets dataset, we investigate the trends and patterns of food waste across different regions in the world.", "dataset": ["Food Balance Sheets"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "We analyze household survey data from both urban and rural areas in Bangladesh and complement it with satellite imagery data to study the effects of climate change on crop yields.", "dataset": ["household survey data", "satellite imagery data"], "topic": ["Climate Change", "Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "The study utilizes two datasets: Social Accounting Matrix (SAM) and Generalized Training Regression Network (GTRN) to assess the competitiveness of Malaysia's manufacturing sector.", "dataset": ["Social Accounting Matrix (SAM)", "Generalized Training Regression Network (GTRN)"], "topic": ["Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "We investigate the correlation between debt and financial sector development across different countries using two datasets: World Bank's International Debt Statistics and Financial Development and Structure Database.", "dataset": ["World Bank's International Debt Statistics", "Financial Development and Structure Database"], "topic": ["Debt", "Financial Sector"]}, {"sentence": "This study combines data from World Bank's Enterprise Surveys and Doing Business report to analyze the relationship between digital development and the ease of doing business in South Asian countries.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Enterprise Surveys", "Doing Business report"], "topic": ["Digital Development", "Governance"]}, {"sentence": "We use multiple datasets including INFORM risk index and Flood Risk Model dataset to assess the disaster risk management in Southeast Asian countries.", "dataset": ["INFORM risk index", "Flood Risk Model dataset"], "topic": ["Disaster Risk Management"]}, {"sentence": "Using the PISA dataset and nation-wide assessment data, we investigate the effectiveness of various education policies on student performance across different regions in China.", "dataset": ["PISA dataset", "nation-wide assessment data"], "topic": ["Education"]}, {"sentence": "The paper studies the impact of renewable energy policies on economic growth using a panel dataset that includes both developed and developing countries.", "dataset": ["panel dataset"], "topic": ["Energy", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "This research uses two complementary datasets: Global Forest Watch and MODIS land cover data to estimate the deforestation rate over the years in the Amazonian forest.", "dataset": ["Global Forest Watch", "MODIS land cover data"], "topic": ["Environment"]}, {"sentence": "We analyze the World Bank's Mining database and EITI reports to study the impact of mining activities on social inclusion and poverty reduction in Africa.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Mining database", "EITI reports"], "topic": ["Extractive Industries", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}]

content: [{"sentence": "This paper uses multiple datasets including Global Findex and LSMS covering 11 African countries to examine the impact of financial inclusion on poverty reduction.", "dataset": ["Global Findex", "LSMS"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "Using the Food Balance Sheets dataset, we investigate the trends and patterns of food waste across different regions in the world.", "dataset": ["Food Balance Sheets"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "We analyze household survey data from both urban and rural areas in Bangladesh and complement it with satellite imagery data to study the effects of climate change on crop yields.", "dataset": ["household survey data", "satellite imagery data"], "topic": ["Climate Change", manufacturing sector.", "dataset": ["Social Accounting Matrix (SAM)", "Generalized Training Regression Network (GTRN)"], "topic": ["Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "We investigate the correlation disaster risk management in Southeast Asian countries.", "dataset": ["INFORM risk index", "Flood Risk Model dataset"], "topic": ["Disaster Risk Management"]}, {"sentence": "Using the PISA dataset and nation-wide assessment data, we investigate the effectiveness of various education policies on student performance across different regions in China.", "dataset": ["PISA dataset", "nation-wide assessment data"], "topic": ["Education"]}, {"sentence": "The paper studies the impact of renewable energy policies on economic growth using a panel dataset that includes both developed and developing countries.", "dataset": ["panel dataset"], "topic": ["Energy", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "This research uses two complementary datasets: Global Forest Watch and MODIS land cover data to estimate the deforestation rate over the years in the Amazonian forest.", "dataset": ["Global Forest Watch", "MODIS land cover data"], "topic": ["Environment"]}, {"sentence": "We analyze the World Bank's Mining database and EITI reports to study the impact of mining activities on social inclusion and poverty reduction in Africa.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Mining database", "EITI reports"], "topic": ["Extractive Industries", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}]
